name: Mothers Night
description:
Visit your grandmothers house on Halloween night, discover that she is not who you think she is. Explore the house, read notes and investigate what is going on in this psychological horror game.

!Warning!

This game contains Jump Scares and loud sounds.

Epileptic Warning!

~MacOS Version Available Soon~ Recommended Hardware High Settings:

Graphics Card: GTX 950 +

Ram: 8GB +

CPU i3 8100 +
